sourceMeaningMnemonic: You got your <radical>ice</radical> <radical>orders</radical>. Of course, your ice orders are to make things <kanji>cool</kanji> and <kanji>cold</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Making things cool and cold are pretty much the only orders you'll hear from ice. Ice is very simple in that regard.
readingMnemonic: How will you make things <kanji>cool</kanji> and <kanji>cold</kanji>? You'll use a special <reading>ray</reading> (<ja>れい</ja>) gun that shoots a cold ray.
readingInfo:
Imagine a cold ray coming out of your ray gun. Anything it touches becomes cold. "Stay cool, bird boy," you say.

Hint: when you see the radical <radical>orders</radical> it's fairly likely the reading will be <ja>れい</ja>.
